content.prompt: Richard’s reaction to the letter Mildred gives him suggests that the “other letter” (line 22) has been an obstacle to him because he was

choices.label: overwhelmed by the knowledge that Muriel returns his feelings
convinced that Muriel did not mean what she said
upset that Muriel had talked to Mildred about her feelings
saddened that Muriel did not want to be in a relationship with him

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the function of conflict in a text.
